1.0.1.name: wordpress/cockpit
1.0.1.description:
Track your WordPress site's traffic, and automatically posts to Twitter when you publish a post or page. you'll need a Just Account to use it. Creating Cockpit Account is free.

□Automatically post updates to Twitter easily.

When you publish a post or page, automatically posts updates to Twitter. You need not to enter the contents of tweet, or to copy and paste the URL. Of course, you can also manually modify the content and post to Twitter.

□Web analytics reporting the effect of Twitter posts.

Not only the number of access is displayed in the graph, but the effect of Twitter posts be displayed graphically.

□Day-to-day advice for attracting customers!

Some advice for increase the access to your site will be sent everyday. If you follow the advice, the access to your site is increased.
